Name: Inky is With You
Desc: A memorable moment worth commemorating. Can be used to decorate your room.
Desc2:
A picture taken with {NPC_103174203}. {M#Belle}{F#Wise} helped to take the photo.
It's a precious image taken shortly after adopting {NPC_103174203}. His eyes look so clear and full of wisdom. Looking at the picture makes you want to rub it.
Gazing at this picture satisfies you when you can't pet {NPC_103174203}.
